{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Coronet South |image = [[File:Mt. Coronet South.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt. Coronet South |tokens = 60,500 |location = North of Route 208, the absolute bottom of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Mt. Coronet South''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 651,500 |- | Boss || 3,000,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Clefairy (x2) * Zubat * Machop * Geodude * Nosepass * Meditite * Chingling * Bronzor * Magikarp * Barboach * Noctowl * Machoke (boss) * Bronzong (boss) * Absol (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | [[Lucky Incense]] || 33% |}
